plot: This 2-DVD set depicts classic advertisement films and examples of automobile centric stories. It includes classic &"Capitalistic Realist&" dramas showing the manufacture of cars from foundry to finished vehicle. Also features examples of a day in the life of automobile workers in the U.S. while attempting to convince them that their own fortunes were inexorably linked to the fortunes of the company.   Written by  Bart Calendar
title: History of Advertising: Automobiles (1930-1940)
